SEARCH
Module ing.sw
Package IS24_LB11.network

Class ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
IS24_LB11.network.ClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ClientHandler extends Object implements Runnable
Handles communication with a single client connected to the server. This includes receiving messages from the client, sending messages to the client, and managing the client's state within the game.
